tasks.label: Arbitraje: Validate build & tests (env-checked)
tasks.command: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "./scripts/validate_env.ps1; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; try { poetry lock } catch { Write-Host 'poetry.lock check/lock skipped or failed' }; try { poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi --with dev } catch { Write-Host 'install with dev failed, trying without dev'; poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi }; try { poetry run ruff check src || Write-Host 'ruff check failed or ruff not installed' } catch { Write-Host 'ruff not available; skipping' }; if (Test-Path 'tests') { try { poetry run pytest -q tests } catch { Write-Host 'pytest failed' } } else { Write-Host 'No tests directory; skipping pytest' }"
